Literature.Author: Barran G, Kolodziejek J, Coquet L, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Nowotny N, Conlon JM, Mechkarska M

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial, cytotoxic, and insulin-releasing activities of the amphibian host-defense peptide ocellatin-3N and its L-lysine-substituted analogs.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Hunter L, Attoub S, Casciaro B, Mechkarska M, Abdel-Wahab YHA

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=98 µM,Human umbilical vein endothelial cells HUVEC:LC50=48±9 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=31.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-2312(MIC=31.25µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=62.5µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC=250µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=31.25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 49472(MIC=62.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2814(MIC=62.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=62.5µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=62.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=6.25µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=0.78µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6.25µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=6.25µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=25µM),Human lung carcinoma A549(LC50=35±1µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-231(LC50=51±16µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HT29(LC50=69±10µM)
